user.title: Tesla Order Status
user.description: Connect to your Tesla account to track order status.

auth.title: Authenticate with Tesla
auth.description:
1. Open the authorization URL below in your browser
2. Log in to your Tesla account
3. After login, you will see a "Page Not Found" page - this is CORRECT!
4. Copy the full URL from your browser's address bar
5. Paste it in the field below

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Tesla API
error.invalid_url: Invalid redirect URL. Please check the URL and try again.

abort.already_configured: Tesla Order Status is already configured
